36  #: Backslash-escape Substituter 
37  #: 
38  #: :Type: ``callable`` 
39  _SLASHSUB = _re.compile(ur'\\(.)', _re.S).sub 
40

42 -class TextDecoder(object): 

43      """ 
44      Decoder for text input 
45   
46      :IVariables: 
47        `encoding` : ``str`` 
48          Character encoding 
49      """ 
50      __implements__ = [_interfaces.DecoderInterface] 
51   

52 -    def __init__(self, encoding): 

53          """ 
54          Initialization 
55   
56          :Parameters: 
57            `encoding` : ``str`` 
58              Character encoding 
59          """ 
60          self.encoding = encoding 

61   

62 -    def normalize(self, name): 

63          """ :See: `DecoderInterface` """ 
64          return name 

65   

66 -    def decode(self, value, errors='strict'): 

67          """ :See: `DecoderInterface` """ 
68          return value.decode(self.encoding, errors) 

69   

70 -    def attribute(self, value, errors='strict'): 

71          """ :See: `DecoderInterface` """ 
72          if value.startswith('"') or value.startswith("'"): 
73              value = value[1:-1] 
74          return _SLASHSUB(ur'\1', value.decode(self.encoding, errors))

77  from tdi import c
